name: Snowfall (RodFireProductions, PrideNPestilence)
description:
In a remote village surrounded by monsters, a pair of lovers stand guard. But the cold is a dangerous thing, and the monsters even worse.

This was made for a school club game jam within 2 weeks. The themes were "Downfall" and "You are the World".

Features:

  • 2k words
  • 2 CGs
  • No music / sound (sorry)

Credits:

Writing & Character Art - PastaPapi

Programming, CG & Background Art, GUI - Rodrick 'RodFireProductions'
